messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
It’s a long way between Floaroma
and Eterna City. So, let’s battle!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Wawawaah!
I’m out of Pokémon that can go!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Camping with Pokémon!
Do you have any idea how fun that is?
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
While I was enjoying camping, my
Pokémon got all buffed up!
